title: Typography in UI Design
excerpt: Using type effectively to enhance readability and user experience.
content:
Typography plays a crucial role in UI design, affecting readability, hierarchy, and overall user experience. Good typography can guide users through an interface and convey information effectively.

Key Concepts

  • Font selection and pairing
  • Typographic hierarchy
  • Line length and spacing
  • Responsive typography

Best Practices

  1. Choose readable fonts for body text
  2. Use font size, weight, and color to create hierarchy
  3. Maintain consistent typography throughout your interface
  4. Ensure sufficient contrast between text and background
  5. Use appropriate line length and line height for readability
  6. Consider how typography scales across different devices
